import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Container, Header } from 'semantic-ui-react' import { Title } from '../components/Title' import { SearchForm } from '../components/SearchForm' export const Search = () => { const [input, setInput] = useState({ type: "", term: "" }); return ( <> < Title icon="book" />

Whether you're looking for something new or just wanting to set a reminder for yourself, our search service has just what you need!

< SearchForm /> ) }
